Replies.Reply: I cried the whole week of Sam's funeral.
And I want them to look like you.
Sure. So, is this gonna be a real wedding ?
You know what I mean, Sam. You've already been through the big ceremony with too hundred people.
Naked skydiving ?
It's OK. It's going to have to be a small one, you know.
Oh, you're invited.
And my friend Graham upstairs.
You're the only friend I need. You're the best thing that ever happened to me.
Hello ?... Hold on a second.
Sam, it's your ex-wife.
It's Lisa.
It's where you live. She's entitled.
Talk to her now. You're already up. I'll get that.
I take it back. She's not entitled.
I'm sorry... Sam left. I told him to. And... And I can't be alone tonight... so I came up here.
Thanks.
What time is it ?
Oh, my God  Allison jumps from the bed in a hurry.
I've got a meeting. It's really important.
Hi !
I'm sorry, I'm a little late.
Thank you.
So...
You can redefine your product on-screen without going to an expensive designing concept. This is Allison Jones' software, and it's a marketing tool no one else has.
I stay to be the person to speak. That's included in the quote.
Best for last.
I think you'll find that's reasonable... as a ballpark.
No, I wouldn't rely much on what she says. It was not a friendly split. And I did all the work. And... she took all the credit and she didn't like me telling her so.
Well, I could go for something...
I'll get this. You'll see it on my first expense report.
depressing.
Maybe it's all a sign I should go home.
You'll find someone again.
I know that. I can do it on my own.
I'll just get a room-mate.
Not if I have a room-mate.
Oh, yes, that's a promise. Rent-stabilized, so you couldn't come on the lease.
Oh !... Hi !
Yes... I'm Allie.
You know what ? I'm not. Would it be all right if you came back tomorrow ?
No, I'm fine.
I just... I don't think I had lunch, that's all.
It's only this one. The one in the bathroom works. Here...
I use a wrench.
Oh ! Wow !... Wow !... I'm so sorry.
Oh, yes...
Hedra... that's unusual.
Not Hedy ? Like Hedy Lamarr ? That's exotic.
Thanks.
Oh ! You can just toss that. I was just cleaning up. He's the reason why I'm looking for a new room-mate.
Well, nothing going to change it, except for... maybe that my faucets will work. When can you move in ?
Congratulations.
I've got one friend. Graham. He lives just upstairs...
Oh, not like that : he's gay. So, anyway, it's not a real friendly building, but, at least, there's no problem with privacy. 'Cause, I mean, you just close your door...
No problem.
Anyway.
Laundry room.
I don't go in there at night. It's a bit creepy. It's okay in the day, but, still, lock yourself in.
No, that's mail key.
Oh, it's not bad, it's just kind of old.
Sometimes this gets stuck and you have to use this screwdriver.
Excuse me.
Eleven  The tenant presses a button on the switchboard by the door.
Okay.
I think you look very comfortable.
But I found this.
I think you'd look great with that.
I think you should take them.
Well, I think they go great with that dress.
Well...
God! I didn't know you were home. I was...
I was... I was... God, I'm sorry. You haven't even been here two weeks and I'm already in your room.
I was just about to go through your drawers !
Oh, I hope you don't mind. I just... I always wanted to try that.
Well... I don't really know about that. I'm an only child.
Oh, that's so sad.
Oh... nothing. It's just a little housewarming. It's like that.
Oh no no...
But I can't take these.
Thanks, they're great.
Excuse me.
Hello ?...
No, Sam.
No, it's not a good time.
No, there's nothing to talk about anyway. Sam, there's somebody here right now...
All right ?... Okay... Bye.
Yoo-hoo !
Well, I hope they meant it.
Oh ! Come on.
Okay. Come on. Shhh !
God, Hedy, thanks. I never would've got it done without you.
Ready ?
Who, Hedy ?
No, no, it's a lot of fun having a girlfriend again.
You were great, Graham. I just had to spend some time with her. She needed a lot of help moving in. Plus, I've been working like crazy. I promised I'm not avoiding you.
Fine. Sure, I'll watch Carmen.
It's so cruel. We'll be fine.
Oh !... That's Hedy. I really freaked her out about people knowing she's living in the building. I would've had you down to meet her... but she's shy.
Well.
Friday ?
Hey, I thought you'd be at work.
Don't tell me we have the same belt.
You have to see these. Look, cookies for dogs.
I had to get them. They're so great.
Buddy !
What are you doing here ? Hedy !
Why can't you just leave me alone ?
Easier that way, Okay ? Is that so hard to try to make it easier on me ?
Wait a minute. You lied to me ! If she hadn't called, would I have found out ? I think that's really scary, okay ?
Well, I guess it is. And... I didn't get any letter. So, I wasn't trying to punish you by not answering it. I just didn't get it.
Well, I didn't get those, either. What did it say ?
You really hurt me, Sam.
I don't know. Just got herself on hands. Haste wouldn't do.
God, Hedy, what are you doing in my room ?
Sorry, I guess I just didn't think.
Okay, okay, I'm sorry. It was thoughtless, really. You're making me feel like I'm sixteen years old here.
Hey, are you okay ?
Yeah... Yeah, I made him suffer.
Right.
Thanks.
No, no, wait a little. You'll find someone, Hedy. I mean, God, if I can...
Well, anyway, Sam's going to keep his place for a while. I know you just spent a lot on furniture.
Nothing's happened, Hedy, come on. Look, I'll talk to Sam.
Mitchell walks to the desk next to Barbara's one, where he starts flipping the cards of a Rolodex.
Great.
Oh no, that's Graham Knox. He is my upstair neighbor. That was just for last night. Oh, he's the first one.
Well, maybe you start spreading the word.
You thirsty ?
I'll be right back, okay.
We going ?
This is fine.
All right, Hedy, he's fine.
Poor guy's doesn't who's who anymore.
Replies.Didascalie: (in a much lower voice, for Sam's ears only)

Replies.Reply: No, I'm okay. I'm fine. I just didn't get a very good sleep, that's all. Nightmares. Okay ?
You don't have to do that, Hedy. You're doing enough already.
Oh, no, it's kind of an anniversary tonight. So I think we'll be eating out.
It's easier this way, believe me. And this could be nice.
This is such a mess. I just can't do it right now. I think I'm her only friend.
Hedy !
You left the window open. How could you do that ?
Hello ?... Hi, Mitch...
What ?
God ! I know... I'm... No, I'm just... I'm just running a little late.
I didn't forget. I dunno... Just hold them till five, okay ? Thanks.
Thank you.
Oh no, here, I've got to go. I'm just cleaning a bit.
Well... Block up some time for me next week. Then... it's just a little late tonight.
Okay... Something simple.
All right... You know, this is just the Mickey-Mouse stuff, but it does come in handy.
Okay. Enter the vendor's name.
Very good.
That's all right. Barbara will handle that.
Well, I hope you're satisfied with what I've done.
But this is it. I mean, there ain't much more. Just maybe a little fine tuning, that's it. I have some free time now, if you want us to set up some meeting with your colleagues.
What are you doing ?
Mitch, please, don't. That's enough.
Mitch...
Let me turn around, okay ?
I can't believe I didn't see it coming. It's just so humiliating.
But what I did... It was like something inside taking over.
He'll pay. I set up all my programs, so they have to eventually.
You don't understand. It's the contacts more than the money. When I just took the job for the word of mouth and now that's gone. It's just like he's put me back to square one.
What can I do ?
Who are you calling ?
Who are you talking ?
Gee, Hedy, I hope you never get mad at me.
Oh, Hedy, I'm not really up for this today.
Oh, Hedy.
Thank you.
You've got to be kidding.
You just should've asked first.
Can I have the Consumer Market, please.
Thank you... please.
Ellen Besch...
Oh, no, thanks. I'm just going up and visit Graham.
Okay.
Have fun.
Taxi !
It's very important. She has something of mine.
No, thanks.
God, you've got to help me, Graham. You've got to tell me what to do.
And she stole a letter that Sam wrote me. I have to do something.
You're right. I'll tell her tonight.
I can't just throw her out on the street. I mean, she obviously needs help.
That was very impressive.
Thanks.
Oh, tomorrow.
Yeah.
Oh... What do you hear ?
Oh, no ! Oh no ! I'm... I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
Yeah. She's my problem. I'll handle it.
Thank you for the tea. I'll see you tomorrow.
Hedy ?
Hedy ?
Hedy ?
Hello, Mr. Besch, you don't know me, my name is Allison Jones. I think my room-mate Hedra is your daughter. Ellen.
Oh, thank you.
It's okay, it's just I was starting to worry. You've been in here so long. I'm making some tea. Do you want some tea ? Camomile.
Are you crampy ? Sometimes tea helps. Something warm. We could talk.
About Sam and I wanting this place for ourselves...
...It's just crazy keeping two places like this.
Well, frankly, I think that's my business. I'm sorry, but it is.
No, that's not it at all. You've been a good room-mate.
Is it Sam ?
I'm expecting a call from Sam. He might be coming in tonight.
I understand. Hey, we'll still be friends. We'll keep in touch.
Hedy ?... Hedy ?
Hedy ?
No, Hedy, I didn't mean for you to move out today.
Sure, that's fine. Look, I'm really sorry it didn't work out.
I'll help.
We can have breakfast when you get back.
Oh... I just suddenly felt sick. It was the funniest thing.
Oh, that's all right, I'm fine.
Yeah. I can go out for a while. I feel much better now.
Oh, it's in the blender. I've got to go out.
I'm out. I'm just going to go upstairs and see Graham. He called while you were out.
Maybe you're right.
You didn't... you didn't do it, Hedy, did you ?
You couldn't have him !
Why ?... Why ?
But... but you shouldn't run. That'll only make it worse. I know you weren't yourself when you did this, Hedy.
Hedy, it'll never work. Besides ... people have seen you.
Nobody's home.
He must be sleeping. We were up late last night.
Graham ?
Mmmm !
Please...
Don't make me leave you, Ellen.
Shhh !... It's okay. It's okay.
Great.
Hm-m. And you can pay by credit card.
L.A., right ?
First class ?
Well, we can use one of Graham's cards. I think I saw his wallet in the living room.
I know I saw it somewhere. Maybe it's in the kitchen.
No ! No ! No ! No !
Be careful, she's crazy.
Where is she ?
No one who knows me will believe that I wrote that. I was never that scared. Well... not like that.
Okay.
I'm not like your sister, Hedy. Not any more. I'm like you now.
Get off him !
Graham, stay inside !
Poor kids.
So, if I got to be able to drag you away from computer tomorrow, I'll buy you that ring.
As opposed to a fake one ?
That was the fake one. This is the real one. You can have any kind of wedding you want. Underwater. In and out of a steam room in the wild. Horseback.
Naked skydiving !
Except me.
It won't be long before you know half the people in New York. People like you, you know... but I found you first.
What ?
Yeah ?... No... Because... I'm hanging up now.
I'm sorry. She shouldn't call here.
Don't... don't answer it.
Why does she do this ?
Huh-huh...
But no, don't blame Hedy. It's not her fault, okay.
I kind of forced my way in here. I had to see you.
You've got to talk to me, baby. You just can't pretend I don't exist.
But people screw up. People do something wrong. And I was wrong, I admit it. And you just... You cut me off. You don't take my calls. You don't answer my letters.
Okay. You know, I know that there is something that you just can put back together. I was hoping that this wasn't one of them.
Well, I sent it with the keys.
Forget the letter. I love you. I can't exist without you.
Shhh !
Say... Next month, that would give her enough time.
No.
Right, just a minute.
All right, all right.
Hey !
Why don't we get away together ? Drive to Box Camp ?
Well, wouldn't you like to take a day off... Renting a car...
But this is half the size for twice the price from your apartment.
Can you imagine going from The Victoria to this.
Do you think we can smoke her out ?
I thought I did.
Allie !
Thanks, that pill helped.
Well, she wants me to.
Listen, if she blames anybody, she blames me, huh ?
Shh !
DAY YOU GAVE ME I'M  Allison reads the letter very attentively. Suddenly she hears some noise coming from the bathroom and turns her head towards the noise.
Oh... I just got in from the airport. Is she asleep ?
Okay.
Goodnight, honey.
Oh... Oh... Jesus !... Oh... Gee...
Allie ?
Knew what ?
She'll know what ?
That you came up here and pretended to be her ? My God, what is this hair ? What is this supposed to mean ? You're in her clothes. You're wearing her perfume! For Christ-
You think she's going to thank you for that news, do you ?
She can't... she can't stand you, for Christ-sake !
Oh, bullshit !
You're too needy. You're always cleaning. You're constantly in her face.
What ?
She never said a word to me about that.
You're nuts, you know that ? Yes... I think you're out of your skull, that's right.
Don't touch me !
Yeah... Well, you won't have to say a word, sweetheart, because I'm going to tell her myself.
Fucking bitch !
It's 4 a.m. !
Allie ?
Allie, I let you sleep.
About ten.
There are worse things than being on your own, you know.

Come on ! You came here for a reason. Sam has nothing to do with that. No guy does. You think I'd let some guy interfere with my acting career ? Assuming I had a career... or a guy to interfere with it.
Maybe I will. Why not ? But the point is, if I don't... I don't.
Absolutely.
You could always call him, Allie.
Ready to kill her yet ?
Hm-mm !
I can tell. I was worried for a while that you were so down. You were starting to look like a Kennedy wife.
Oh, I've got you cornered now. I've been meaning to come down and see you. I was on my way to ask you something.
Will you cat sit again ? I have to go to Boston this week-
Hey, I've made you a set. You know which one to try. And ignore the litter box this time, I do.
You know, I think I saw her the other day, your room-mate.
That'll be great. I'll make dinner when I get back.
Jesus, Allie, what is it ?
Get rid of her.
She is a lunatic, Allie. She's got to go. Do it tonight.
Allie, either she's gone by Saturday, or I go to the police, okay ?
I can be butch when I have to. I got it from my mother.
That's good.
Oh, this is a little embarrassing, but since we're letting our hair down... Those old air vents between our apartments carry sound. It's a weird acoustic thing.
Big deal. I am sorry. I should've mentioned it sooner.
You're sure you want to go down there ?
Okay.
I don't know. I don't even know what hyper-vigilant is. No, I've never met the woman. She could be infantile or paranoid, whatever. I don't know...
I tell you what, let me go downstairs. If I call you from there, will you talk to my friend ? She can tell you better than I can. Right, okay.
Thanks. So... so, all right... so, so you might hear from us. Love to Jack. And you're not charging me for this.
Carmen...
Allie !
Hedy ?
Wait... hey, wait, it's okay. Take it easy. Take it... We just want to get you some help.
Okay, take it easy.
No problem.
Hi !
No, no, it's worth the wait.
Who do I get to run it ?
Ah !... The quote... That's the one thing I haven't seen.
Here's where I was thinking of playing.
It makes sense for you. You see, after our last meeting, I made some phone calls... to your former partner, for one.

Well, I was more interested in the settlement you made. You walked off with the hardware and a rent-controlled apartment. Which means your overhead is minimal, as is your client list. I could improve that if you're as good as you say you are.
But that is the only way to prove it.
No, no, please, don't embarrass yourself. That's my final offer. Now, of course, if you would like to think about it...
I look forward to it.
I'll set it up, I'll set it up. Maybe I... I'll call you tonight after I check on some things.
Well, I've got to admit, I'm very impressed.
You know, I can see I'm not going to be able to afford you any more.
...but you know that, don't you ?
And here, I thought all the guys would resist you. As if anyone ever could.
Hold it. Hold it. Not so fast. Now everybody under me knows more than I do. I hate that.
Oh, please, please, just a taste.
Something simple. Right now.
Oh !... Vendor...
J-o-n-e-s... All..i...son.
Ho-ho. According to this, we should have paid you last Friday.
Not till I give her the word.
So far.
I was thinking that maybe I want to keep you all to myself.
Top her ?
That's just that you're so tight.
Hey, look...
I've been a good boy, haven't I ? And you've been a good girl. We have nothing to prove any more.
This is your last chance to play before you're an old married lady.
That's better. That's better.
Just a second... A second...
Fucking bitch !
What ?
What ?
What is it ? What?
Shit !
...in 24 hours of the rest of your data will be irretrievably lost. This payment policing program is installed on all of Allison Jones software."
Bitch !
Busy.
You turn them off.
Turn them all off !
Oh... Excuse me, miss, is this 1203 ? Is Graham Knox at home ?
Actually, I'm looking for a woman Allison Jones ? Do you know her ?
Mitchell Myerson.
She did a job for me.
Yeah, I know that. I was just down at her apartment. But I did contact her here once.
Oh, sorry.
This is hers. You do know her.
What ?
Okay, okay... I'm... I'm getting up. Okay.
Don't worry about her, I took care of her.

We see a newspaper clip, where Allison's ad has been highlighted with a felt-pen red rectangle. It says :  SWF seeks female to share apartment in west 70s. Non-smoker professional preferred. 555-9814  Around this ad are other ads, all about apartment renting or sharing.
I'm an incest survivor, you know. I haven't remembered the instance yet, but I know it's there somewhere. I just have the sense that I survived something. All my therapists think so.
Oh God, a kitchen ! I hate kitchens, cooking, cleaning, anything feminine. I mean, it's probably my mother's fault.
I think this could work. And if you feel the same, please give me a call.
Hi !... The front door was kind of open. Are you Allison Jones ?
Oh, I'm Hedra Carlson. We spoke on the phone this morning.
Are you sure you're okay ?
Why don't you just... sit down.
I'll make you some tea.
I got terrible nicknames growing up, which I'm not telling you.
Well, I wasn't that exotic in grade school... as opposed to now, right ?
They're dry.
Here.
Do you know if there is a chance that you guys patch things up ? As... I do not want to move in and catch you being bound again, and then have things change. It would just be awkward.
No, really ?
Thank you.
A friend ?
Yeah.
I'll leave you alone, you know... I mean, whatever's good for you.
Wow !
Hey, look, Allie, this could be good, huh.
This one ?
This is creepy.
Fourteen, please.
Look what I found.
I'm not sure. Hold on, I'll check.
Allie, it's Sam.
Where do you guys learn to dress like that ? I mean, it's just so New York.
Yeah, I never know what looks good.
Yes ?
Oh !
Okay  Hedra takes the dress and looks at it.
Hey ! What do you think ?
Oh God, you like them ?
You take them  She gives her shoes to Allison.
I'll just borrow them when I want to.
That smells nice on you.
Oh God, no. anything you want... you want.
Go ahead. Share and share alike.
Hu-uh... There's just me.
I am... Well, I was supposed to be a twin, but she was stillborn.
I grew up like a part of me was missing.
Allie ! God !
It's beautiful. Thank you. What do I owe you ?
Shhh !...
They look beautiful on you.
It's housewarming.
Oops !
Why don't we order some Chinese ?
Buddy !
Oh, yes, you're a good clean boy. You're going to cheer her up, are you ? Hmm ? You're going to cheer her up. So she'll let you stay.
I know I shouldn't have, but they were just giving him away... in the market. But they said I could bring him back to-morrow.
Well... his name's Buddy. I had a dog named Buddy when I was little.
Tomorrow, okay. I promise.
You're working so hard.
I love helping.
Wait... Wait...
Oh yeah ! Family portrait.
Yeah.
No.
Well... Yeah ... Sorry... Listen, I have to talk to you.
Oh, they're great.
Can I just talk to you for a second...
I tried to let you know.
I've got to get out of here now. Unless you need me...
Okay.
Oh, yes, towards the front, against the wall.
Hi, Allie, it's me. I'm just calling to see if you're okay.
Hey ! It's not for you !
Where the hell have you been ?
I've been waiting since six o'clock last night to hear from you. I'm worried sick. Buddy was crying. I thought I might as well come in here, so it calm down.
No, you didn't. There's such a thing as a phone, you know.
Yeah... Yeah. Just... forget it. So, I guess you've patched things up with Sam, huh ?
Is that an engagement ring ?
Beautiful ring.
Really great.
I'm sure you'll be very happy ... you'll be very happy and I'll be alone.
Why don't you look in the mirror ?... Huh ? Look !

Look ! You're in a different league. I know that. You have this great personality. You have this great style. You're running your own business. You're always going to find someone. You'd have to be stupid to think that you wouldn't.
Well, I guess you... you and Sam want to be together. So...
Yeah, your timing is great, Allie, it's really great ! You promised me this wouldn't happen. Exactly what...
Well, you'd know more about that than I would.
Oh, hi !
Oh well... Well I think I'll turn in. Goodnight, Allie.
Goodnight, Sam.
They'll get cold.
Hi !
Scrambled or fried ?
Buddy, come here, boy.
You've got a good day for it if it doesn't get too hot.
Oh, I don't mind. It's clean when you can't tell I'm here.
Oh... Hey, if the eggs were okay, maybe you guys can trust me with dinner. Do you know when you'll be back ?
Really ? Well, that's great... Well, good luck.
Goodbye.
Buddy, come here.
Come here, sweetie.
I know... I know.
Buddy, come !
What ?
But I thought we could leave it open. I know you fixed it this morning.
It's me. I interrupted you when I called you in for breakfast. And Allie, it's my fault.
Allie !
Are you still going on that trip tomorrow ?
If I'd just let you finish your work this morning...
No, Allie, don't turn this around. You're the victim. He should pay for this.
What ! I'm not talking about getting paid, I'm talking about getting even.
Only if you let him. But you won't let him, will you ?
Oh, Allie...
Of course, Sam's away. I didn't want to say anything... How he could go on that trip the day after Buddy died.
Especially when it was his fault.
Hello ! May I speak with your husband, please ?
Yes, I know it's late. Tell him it's Allison Jones, he'll take the call.

Listen, you pathetic shit. Do you want to hold on to your business ?... No, you listen to me this time, asshole ! If you trash me around town, you're fucked and your family is fucked, too ! You got that ? It won't just be you.
Let me tell you, he is pissing in his p.j.'s right now.
What ?
No, no, no, this is going to be fun. It'll make you feel better, promise. Okay ? And I'm paying. Go.
Let's go.
It'll be fine, come on.
Well, I wanted it to be a surprise.
This feels so good on my neck. I didn't think you'd mind.
Do you want me to fix you something before I go ?
Okay.
I love myself like this.
Yeah.
I love myself like this.
Taxi !
Hey !
Come on, Jim.
Diet.
Yes.
Allie ?
I'm home.
Allie ?
Allie ?
God...
Goodnight.
I'm sorry...
No, Please... Please... I didn't do anything wrong.
I'm sorry, I didn't do anything.
What ?
I can't hear you.
Yeah... that'd be great.
Mine always comes when I'm wearing something nice.
About what ?
Well... Well, I... I thought you wanted a long engagement so you could make sure you can trust him again.
Huh-huh... It's me, isn't it ? I'll change, Allie. I can change.
Well... He will cheat on you again, that's a promise. And when he does, don't come running to me, okay ? Cause...
I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
Allie ?
Hello ?
Obscene phone call. New York !
Find someone else, jerk !
Just for a little while, okay. Sam will call back if it's busy.
I'm sorry, Allie.
It's no big deal. I'll find some other place. You know, I just... I don't want you making a mistake.
Sure.
Hello ?
No, it's Hedy.
It's after two. Do you want me to wake her ?
Goodnight, Sam. Sleep well.
No, not Allie.
Hey !
Hey, sleepy guy.
I knew it.
I told her. Guys like you don't change. You can't be faithful. And now she'll know.
You knew it was me. Come on ! You knew and you didn't care.
Well, I don't expect you to understand her friendship.
That's not true.
Huh-huh.
She needs me. Who was there for her when her boss almost raped her ?
Could you care of her ? You were off on a business trip or screwing someone.
That's right, she told me.
So... don't try and make me think that we're not close. We lean on each other and we... we protect each other. We're best friends.
Yeah, well, sticks and stones...
Sam !

I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Look, I know you want to save face. I won't tell her, okay ? Just... Just pick up the phone and call her and tell her you're going back to your ex-wife, or something. And I won't say a word, okay ?
No !
Hey !... Hey !
Goodnight.
Oh, hi ! I hope I didn't wake you. I got an early start.
Oh, there, I think that's it.
I hope you don't mind. I'm storing some of my stuff in the cage downstairs.
That way, I won't have to bother... You see what I mean...
Well, I'd better get this stuff out of here.
Allie ?
What are you doing down there ?
Let me help you.
I'll get some water.
Wait !
Drink some.
Okay ?
Feeling better ?
I thought you said breakfast ?
Dressed like that?
Well, still, if you're not feeling well, you should wear more than that.
Oh...
You know why I think you're sick ?
You're upset about Sam.
You know Sam's dead, don't you ?
Yeah, we don't have much time.
Allie, he came in my mouth. Then he tried to beat the shit out of me because I wanted to tell you.
You know, it was an accident. But he deserved it.
Okay, come on. The police will be here soon.
I know. I was you.
Who is this Hedy anyway ?
No one's seen her. She's not on the lease. There's not even a fingerprint of hers here. I've been cleaning like crazy.
No.
Why are you making me do this ?
We're friends, Allie. You could be in a lot of trouble without me. But I'm not going to leave you.
That wouldn't be right. I won't leave you. Okay, let's go.
Go ! Go-go-go !
No-no, up to Graham's. Come on. No-no, he's already involved.
Use these. Come on, come on, hurry up. Go !
He can't hear you.
Your color was beautiful, but I can't go around looking like you any more, can I ?
Okay now, Allie, don't laugh.
Ta-dah !
How's that ? Good ?
22 and 24 are the movie channels. I've got to cash a pay cheque. So I'll only be gone an hour. I know how you hate to be alone. Okay... Are you good and comfortable ? All right.
So, well... When I get back, we'll do your hair, too.
Excuse me ?
Well, maybe next time I'll try blonde.
Yes ?
Oh !
No, no, I'm just watching the place for the week-end like that. It's on a timer. Huh... Huh... I'm sorry.
Please, I'll turn it off. I will.
How could you do that ? Everything I've done, I've done for you. Don't you understand that ? People you hated, I hated.
People like you don't care.
Just like that stupid girl in Tampa. She called my parents, too. Told them all my secrets.
You want to put me away, huh ?
I can't... I can't keep making excuses for you, Allie. I can't... I can't... I can't... I can't... I can't...
Oh God !... Oh God !... Ohhh !
What ?... What ?
No.
Can you make reservations on this ?
Yeah.
Things are going to be different in L.A, Allie. You'll see.
Is it worth it ?
Oh... Me too. Okay, I'll go and see.
Going down.
No, he's on a cruise.
Who are you ?
Oh... There's no one named Jones on this floor.
Well, I'm the only one here and I never met her. So...
Get off of her.
You think she wants you touching her, huh ? I said get off her !
I don't want to try to be loved any more. And you know...

I don't want to be scared any more. Or to kill any more. I don't want to kill any more. I don't want to be alone any more. I don't want to be anything any more. I don't need a reason to kill myself, I need a reason not to and there isn't one.
You don't want to say anything special to anyone ?
Back to Hedra pointing her gun to Allison. She takes Allison's hand and presses it on the screen of the computer.
Now they'll know it was you.
Of course it's you. I never met anyone so scared of being alone. And I saved you from that, but you don't care.
Did you know that identical twins are never really identical ? There's always one that's prettier. And the one who's not does all the work. She used me and then she left me. Just like you.
Come on... take them. Come on, Allie, it's nicer this way.
Allie !
Please...
Please...
I'll kill you !
No... No... No...
No... No... No...
Allie ?
Allie ?
Hey, here you are.
Don't make me come get you... Allie, come out now... Come on... Allie !...
Come out now !
I'm scared ! Where are you ?
Why are you hiding from me ?
You think I can't find you ? Huh ? Your goddam shirt is sticking out of it.
Allie...
Hi, this is Allison Jones. Please leave a message. Thank you.
No messages.
Hedra's hand crumples the bill and puts it in the waste-basket underneath the other items already in the basket.
Good evening, Mister Rawson.
Goodnight, Miss Jones.
Sure.
441 OCEANSIDE EAST TAMPA, FLA  Allison seems surprised by the name on the envelope.

Characters.Character: AUTOMATED MAIL PO BOX NEW YORK

Replies.Reply: NEW YORK NY 10024  She puts the envelopes back into the box, and picks up other documents. They are newspapers clippings.
Sam !

Characters.Character: AND I KNOW HOW LITTLE MY

Replies.Reply: CAN DO TO MAKE THINGS RIGHT.
Something's different.
Yes.
You're an actress, right ? You're never the same person twice.
I like it. I just thought the other was more you.
Really ? I'm flattered. Thanks.
Miss Besch ?
A man's been calling here. Says he's your father.
Hey !
You live here ?
I have to register a complaint.
Jesus...
Mitch !
Look.
It's erasing.
I didn't do anything.
about 25 seconds, then fade-out to black screen, where the end of the credits are rolling up.
